meta.title: The Italian food truck
meta.description: Original Italian food on the move

items.title: 1) Parmiggiana
items.description: Aubergines in a tomato sauce with Parmesan and mozzarella slices

items.title: 2) Napoli
items.description: Grilled italian sausage and mushrooms

items.title: 3) Tricolore
items.description: Fresh sliced mozzarella,tomatoes and basil

items.title: 4) Boscaiola
items.description: Sauted mushrooms in a chesee cream of dolcelatte and double cream

items.title: 5) Prosciutto
items.description: Cooked ham on a bed of sliced mozzarella and wild rocket

items.title: 6) Cotoletta
items.description: Breast fillet dredged in eggs and bredcrumb,lettuce and tomatoes

items.title: 7) Salmon
items.description: Smoked salmon topped with red peppers,lettuce and sun dried tomatoes

items.title: 8) Meat balls
items.description: Mince beef in tomato sauce,with garlic,parsley and Parmesan

menu.title: Calzoni ripieni
menu.description: Made out of flour, yeast, salt and deep fried

items.title: 9) Cheese
items.description: Cheese, tomato sauce, mozzarella

items.title: 10) Mushy
items.description: Mushrooms, mozzarella, mix cheese

items.title: 11) Salami
items.description: Salame, cheese, mozzarella, tomato sauce

items.title: 12) Arancini
items.description: Rice balls stuffed with meat, peas, mozzarella, tomato sauce, dredged in eggs and breadcrumbs and fried

items.title: 13) Panino Napoletano
items.description: Basic pizza dough (flour, yeast, salt) filled with sweet and spicy cheese, bacon. Oven baked

items.title: 14) Montanara
items.description: Basic fried pizza dough (flour, yeast, salt) topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella and basil

items.title: 15) Frittatina
items.description: Pasta stuffed with bacon, mozzarella, besciamella coated with breadcrumbs and fried

items.title: 16) Penne alla Genovese
items.description: Pasta penne, onion, tomato sauce and parmesan.

items.title: 17) Penne alla Bolognese
items.description: Pasta penne, mix meat, carrots, celery, onion, tomato and parmesan.

items.title: 18) Penne with mushrooms
items.description: Pasta penne, mushrooms, garlic, cream and parmesan.

items.title: 19) Penne with meatballs
items.description: Pasta penne, meatballs, parmesan and tomato sauce.

items.title: 20) Rigatoni spicy
items.description: Pasta rigatoni, n'duja, hot tomato sauce and parmesan.

items.title: 21) Rigatoni four cheese
items.description: Pasta rigatoni, sauteed in a cheese cream of dolcelatte and double cream, mozzarella and parmesan.

items.title: 22) Rigatoni with salmon
items.description: Pasta rigatoni, smoked salmon, onion, cream and parmesan.

items.title: 23) Gnocchi with tomato
items.description: Pasta gnocchi, tomato sauce and parmesan.

items.title: 24) Gnocchi with cheese
items.description: Pasta gnocchi, sauteed in a cheese cream of dolcelatte and double cream, mozzarella and parmesan
